plugin.detailedDescription:
Chef is an open-source, systems integration framework built specifically for automating the cloud, making it easy to deploy servers and scale applications throughout your entire infrastructure. The EC-Cher plugin interacts with the Chef shell through the Chef commander agent, allowing you to perform several key functions, such as:
* Download Cookbooks from the Chef repository to the local node. * Install Cookbooks on local nodes (with Git). * Uploaded Cookbooks from the local node to the Chef server. * Add Recipes to a node run-list. * Configuration defined on a node run-list can be applied to a node.
